p:
The human disease flow is presented by the blue blocks where S is the susceptible proportion of humans, which become exposed to the virus, E, at a rate β
h after the contact with infectious mosquitoes Z. After the latent period λ
h , the exposed humans become infectious: either symptomatically I or asymptomatically I
a ; the parameter ϕ determines the ratio between the infectious states. Finally, the infected humans recover reaching the state R at rate α.
